Start Game How to Play Exit
Divide house into rooms, set up necessary equipment. Remember that proper size and position of rooms is very important! You are reselling the house and your goal is to have good profit. Level can be completed once your income exceeds expences. Press "Sell" to find, where did you spend your money and how big will be your profit.
One heater generates power enough for 10 square meters One ventshaft is sufficient for a house. The game will calculate cost of airboxes from it to kitchen and bath. Boiler is necessary when house isn`t connected to central heating.
Please wait...
All sanitary engineering is connected to the riser, same about boilers. The cost of service lines depends on the distance between the riser and them. Radiators wouldn't heat the house in winter without heating pipes. Don't forget to place a cooker in the assumed kitchen. It is better to place the cooker near a wall. Kitchens and toilets are more comfortable with washstands and sinks. Not all the houses are provided with hot water. Be attentive to the initial conditions.
